txt.en: You have recovered many goods from the Corsairs.
Corsairs can be found at Hata Khezrat in eastern Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nCorsairs have stolen many goods from Linhir and hoarded them in Hata Khezrat. You should defeat the Corsairs and reclaim these goods.
Although the Corsairs did not easily part with them, the goods you recovered will be of great aid to the people of Dor-en-Ernil in the coming days of war.
Although the Corsairs did not easily part with them, the goods you recovered will be of great aid to the people of Dor-en-Ernil in the coming days of war.

While scouting Hata Khezrat, you notice the Corsairs have stolen away many of Linhir's goods in their sashes.  The Corsairs took these goods out of spite as they fled Aragorn and the Grey Host, sensing an unavoidable defeat.\n\nIf the people of Dor-en-Ernil are to survive the coming days, they will need all of the supplies and rations they can muster. You would do well to return their goods to Linhir.
In the wake of the Grey Host's arrival in Linhir, the Corsairs that fled the settlement stole valuable goods from the people of Dor-en-Ernil.
Corsairs can be found at Hata Khezrat in eastern Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nCorsairs have stolen valuable goods from Linhir, leaving those Gondorians that remain in even more dire circumstances.
